subject: Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: Highlights: The city was a strong contender to host the 2012 Olympics and for 2016, it has fine-tuned its bid that officials call an “Olympic fiesta.” The events will be held in two main zones: the Core Zone, which will include the Olympic Stadium, and the River Zone, a part of the riverbank which will be reclaimed for public use. Former International Olympic Committee president Juan Antonio Samaranch of Spain, who retains some influence among I.O.C. members, supports the bid.
